nodes.text: The clone trooper doll, also known as a clone trooper toy, was a type of doll that began to be sold at the dawn of the Galactic Empire. On the Outer Rim moon Pantora, at least two of these dolls were sold at a trading post in the central marketplace of Ro Station. Shortly after the Empire's rise, one of those dolls was stolen by the young clone Omega after she was distracted by a crate full of voorpaks. Omega later decorated her stolen trooper doll to look like a member of Clone Force 99, declaring her to now be a "Bad Batcher."
The clone trooper doll is similar to the stormtrooper toy owned by Jyn Erso in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story.
